title: What are some of the non emphatic sunnah prayers (nafl) - assim al hakeem
transcript: okay what are some of the unemphatic sunnan to be prayed first of all whatever is between Adan and nakama so between every there are turakas also the four raqqa before Asar prayer may Allah have mercy upon anyone who prays foreign so we know that there are four before two after the emphatic and you add another two this is of some of the non-emphatic Sunda that you can offer among others and Allah azzawajal Knows Best
